name: JumpBoy (Double Dash)
description:
Controls: 

Movement: "A" and "D" or the arrow keys

Jump: Space, hold down to jump higher!

Restart: Press "R" to respawn at a respawn-point

Next Level: Press "Return"/Enter to go into the next level

Quit: Press "Escape" to quit

Credits: 

Programing: Paul Klockenbrink

Art: Nathan Winter
